quote_first: William listened to a debate on the future of Trident between Tony Blair and Michael Heseltine—both regarded as potential future leaders of their respective parties—when the lights went out in Summers’s living room at
quote_last: . He turned the radio off and made another entry in his notebook.
title: Turn a Blind Eye
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: The only two items that stood out on the whole list for Cork were two calls placed from the home of Wilfred Lipinksi, mayor of Aurora, one at 9:57 P.M. and another at
quote_last: If Lipinski had teenagers who knew about the party at Valhalla, the calls would not have been odd, but all the Lipinski children were long ago grown and gone, and so Cork wondered.
title: Blood Hollow
author: William Kent Krueger

title: Appointment in Samarra
author: John O'Hara
